name: HEISENBERG
description:
W,A,S,D to move,  J to shoot, K to dash, Space Bar to Jump

Use  Top Row 1 to 6 to consume Pills in inventory

The two small enemy's art and door are from Ansimuz.

Somehow I cannot upload any image.

Programming: Alex Yam, Tommy Yue

Art: Alex Yam

Sound: Ace Leung

Level Design: Alex Yam, Tommy Yue

Game Ideas: Alex Yam, Tommy Yue, Ace Leung, Kelvin Chan
